subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets placed Cliff Floyd on the 15-day disabled list with tendinitis in his left Achilles’ tendon, and purchased the contract of outfielder Michael Tucker from Class AAA Norfolk.
snippet: The Mets placed Cliff Floyd on the 15-day disabled list with tendinitis in his left Achilles’ tendon, and purchased the contract of outfielder Michael Tucker from Class AAA Norfolk.
